Description: AWS CloudFormation to create a single EC2 instance with a multi-IP ENI

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

SubnetId.Description: The ID of the Subnet in which to launch the instance

SecurityGroupId.Description: The ID of the Security Group
